mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Uniz (unizSN, unizTypeSN, unizKeyword, enable) VALUES (UNIZ_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{unizTypeSn} ,#{unizKeyword} , #{enable})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM uniz WHERE unizTypeSn=#{unizTypeSn} AND unizKeyword=#{unizKeyword}
mapper.update: UPDATE uniz SET unizkeyword= #{unizKeyword}, enable=#{enable}, updateDatetime=sysdate WHERE unizsn = #{unizSn}
